models.name: lever_types
models.description: Three classes of levers: first (fulcrum middle), second (load middle), third (effort middle) with force vectors

models.name: pulley_systems
models.description: Three pulley systems: fixed pulley (left), movable pulley (middle), compound pulley (right) showing mechanical advantage

models.name: inclined_plane
models.description: Inclined plane with object showing weight, normal force, and parallel force components

models.name: wheel_and_axle
models.description: Wheel and axle mechanism with large wheel, small axle, handle, and load demonstrating mechanical advantage

models.name: wedge_screw
models.description: Wedge (left) splitting block and screw (right) with helical threads showing inclined plane principle

models.name: gear_systems
models.description: Simple gear train with three gears showing motion transfer, speed ratios, and direction changes
